comment: Great professor! This class was very interesting to take and she always provides feedback in class and for papers. Just do not let the final paper sneak up on you because it requires a lot.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lecture heavy

comment: She's great, usually responds to emails within an hour. Just be ready for a couple tough papers. Very picky about APA but gives feedback on what needs to be improved, it's an easy A if you're a good writer/use previous feedback on other papers. Allows 2 absences then takes 2pts off final grade for each absence after that. Overall pretty easy class
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: I mean you have to take this class, but make sure you show up for class and complete the assignments. the biggest part of your grade is obviously the internship but the discussion posts and papers will add up. attendance is also a grade

She was VERY clear and made the course super easy to understand. She actually discussed useful topics and made the assignments and projects pretty interesting. She was super approachable and definitely didn't make it difficult to get an A. Strongly recommend.

There are multiple assignments due each week. Although there are no test for this class, there are papers and projects that are very time consuming, She grades extra hard, and can sometimes come off as being rude. It is best to attend class so that you don't miss any assignment details.

Super sweet lady! Loved her :) Lectures can be kinda long and boring sometimes, but very informative. Make sure to read the powerpoints and textbook before the test because if not you'll be lost on the tests. Easy points on the volunteer hours and reflection paper- just make sure you do them. Easy A if you STUDY.

Powerpoint based, tests are 20 questions which consist of fill in the blank, multiple choice and 2 short answers. Tests are easy but they are super tricky. You are better off reading the chapters in the book then studying the powerpoints. She takes forever to give you feedback on your test. 2 papers, super easy. 20 hours of volunteer work.
